A proclamation, for a thanksgiving throughout the kingdom of Scotland, for the late defeat of the Kings enemies England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II) James II, King of England, 1633-1701. Monmouth, James Scott, Duke of, 1649-1685. Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Earl of, 1629-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ; By E. Mallet ..., Edinburgh : Reprinted at London : 1685.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Broadside. At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the sixteenth day of July, 1685.
=======
